definition: to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Many business owners are still uneasy about hosting sensitive data off-site.
sentences.chinese: 许多企业主至今仍然对托管敏感数据心存疑虑。

sentences.english: Brand seems like a kind of immoderate murder which entrepreneurs conduct to the consumers' thinking rights.
sentences.chinese: 品牌是企业主对消费者思考权的一种超限谋杀。

sentences.english: Some business owners hope to ride out the storm.
sentences.chinese: 一些企业主希望能够安全渡过这场风暴。

sentences.english: The owner maximizes his expected utility under the two constraints.
sentences.chinese: 企业主在两个约束下最大化其预期效用。

sentences.english: Log products are the main products of forest enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 原木产品是森工企业主产品。

sentences.english: Are you the average business owner or freelancer like I am?
sentences.chinese: 你是像我一样的中型企业主或者自由作家吗？

sentences.english: It is one you can use as an employer.
sentences.chinese: 这是你作为企业主可以利用的一个因素。

sentences.english: Lawful income of investors is safeguarded by law. protected.
sentences.chinese: 企业主在仙游境内投资的合法经营收入依法受保护。

sentences.english: In recent years, one in six new small-business owners were immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，每六名小企业主中就有一个是移民。

sentences.english: It can not change the nature of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 允许私营企业主入党不会改变党的性质。

sentences.english: Potential customers among new business owners can be found almost anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你可以发现新企业主中的潜在客户，几乎无处不在。

sentences.english: Some business owners turn to CFOs to establish proper bookkeeping systems.
sentences.chinese: 有些企业主依靠租来的CFO建立合格的记账系统。

sentences.english: Archi's Acres is helping combat veterans become agricultural business owners.
sentences.chinese: 建筑导的亩协助打击老兵成为农业企业主。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
